You will have a total business tax deduction of
Your total annual tax savings will be
Your total monthly savings will be
Enter the percentage of your home that you use regularly and exclusively for business purposes. Divide your office space square footage by the total square feet.
Enter your monthly home expenses including mortgage interest, rent, utilities, insurance, security system, real estate taxes, depreciation, maintenance, repairs, painting, and other related costs.
Enter the monthly number of miles you and your spouse drive for business purposes.
Enter the estimated monthly average cost of business meeting expenses including airfare, hotel, parking, and other related travel and meeting expenses.
Enter the monthly cost of business meals (estimate the number of business meals - breakfast, lunch and dinner - you think you might eat)
Enter the monthly cost of office supplies including paper, printer cartridges, postage, envelopes, copies, etc.
Enter the monthly cost of marketing materials including business cards, leads, flyers, advertising in print, radio, internet and other forms of marketing.
Enter the monthly cost of your business phone line and you and your spouse's cell phones and other electronic devices.
Enter the monthly cost of your Internet access.

Enter the monthly average cost of your current medical related costs including health insurance, out-of-pocket health care expenses for your family, such as co-payments, deductibles, or drug costs not covered by insurance, dental expenses, braces, vision expenses, eye care, contacts, glasses, etc.
Enter the monthly average cost of purchased newspapers, magazines, books and on-line media.
Enter the monthly average cost of entertaining friends and family members in your home.
Enter the monthly average cost of going out to the movies, sporting events, hunting, fishing, or other similar activities.
Enter the monthly average cost of season tickets to sporting events, Broadway plays, or other events.
Enter the monthly cost of your boat, camper, motor home or other recreational vehicles. Estimate your operating expenses including park or parking fees, annual maintenance costs, fuel costs, etc.

Enter the monthly amount that you spend on all of your children from ages 6 to 18 including spending money, sport and team fees, camps, eating out including school lunches, trips to the mall, etc. These are all expenses above the amount you pay for normal support such as housing and meals at home.
Enter the monthly cost of business gifts (maximum is $25 per person annually).
Select the tax bracket for which you are currently paying taxes.
